pullrequest.title: Update priority field to new DSL syntax

content.raw:
I'm afraid that updating the plugin had the bad effect of making all the jobs without the "Use specific priority for this Job" to fail:
http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros_gazebo_pkgs-release-testing/1761/console

I was able to fix one of them by enabling this option manually and re running:
http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_math-any-devel-trusty-armhf

Most of the CI jobs are using priorities so not all the CI pipeline is affect. I'm working on fixing it.
content.html:
I'm afraid that updating the plugin had the bad effect of making all the jobs without the "Use specific priority for this Job" to fail: http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros_gazebo_pkgs-release-testing/1761/console

I was able to fix one of them by enabling this option manually and re running: http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_math-any-devel-trusty-armhf

Most of the CI jobs are using priorities so not all the CI pipeline is affect. I'm working on fixing it.
